posts.post_title: T205 - T206 - T3 Rare Cards For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Levy
Fairly priced to raise quick cash.  No, I don't absolutely need it, but there are a few things I'd rather purchase.

T205 Hoblitzell No Stats - PSA 4 - SOLD - thank you
T206 Warhop - DRUM back - PSA 4 - Sale Pending (GT)
T206 Cobb Red Background - SGC 50 - SOLD - thank you
T3 - Rhoades - PSA 1 - $500

Scans are available upon request.

Regards,
Scott
